short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of a P.1 Change Management Consultant.
description: The DND has several specific requirements as follows:to develop and deliver an electronic format of a Data Literacy Roadmap, in support of the DND/CAF Data Strategy and the Data Strategy Implementation Plan.* The contractor is required to provide the electronic format of the product to be distributed and accessible to all levels of staffing and job roles.* A single contract is expected. * The product shall be delivered to the point of contact as per bid.* Provide by electronic means.* Bidders must acknowledge the terms and conditions in response to the bid submission.
tags: READ it now Ten AT Manitoba.
full_summary:
**P.1 Change Management Consultant**
- **Tender Reference:** PW-22-01005461
- **Solicitation Number:** W6952-23-035
- **Publication Date:** August 26, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date:** September 16, 2022, at 2:00 p.m.
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Tender Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of one (1) P.1 Change Management Consultant, level 2, to develop a Data Literacy Roadmap in support of the DND/CAF Data Strategy and the Data Strategy Implementation Plan. The projects shall be conducted in the National Capital Region (NCR) and the specified location shall be National Defence, 285 Coventry Dr, Ottawa, ON.

**Requirements and Terms:**

* Participation shall be restricted to pre-qualified suppliers under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) method of supply.
* The RFP documents shall not be made available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS).
* Suppliers requiring access to the NETRFED website are encouraged to register prior to tender closing.
* Scope of work includes:
	+ Develop a comprehensive Data Literacy Roadmap
	+ Deliver an electronic format of the product, to be distributed and accessible to all levels of staffing and job roles
* Contract duration shall be from the date of award to six months later.
* Deliverables shall be submitted in either official language.

**Security Requirements:**
The contractor shall possess reliability clearance. This project is assigned a security level of Common PS SRCL #6.

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers:**
The following suppliers are prequalified and eligible to bid on this project:

01 Millennium Consulting Inc.
529040 ONTARIO INC and 880382 ONTARIO INC
7 Theta Inc
... (list of pre-qualified suppliers detailed in the original entry)

**Contracting Entity:**
The contracting entity is the Department of National Defence, and the point of contact for this project is Pehsan Chuah, 613-406-1254, [pehsan.chuah@forces.gc.ca](mailto:pehsan.chuah@forces.gc.ca).
